resources.string: The Dashboard makes it easy to get to campaigns, surveys, and your response history

On the Campaign List screen you can see the campaigns you are participating in (which have already been downloaded to the phone) as well as campaigns available for participation (which are on the server, available to be downloaded to the phone). You can access information about the campaigns you are participating in, as well as set up triggered reminders.
On the Survey List screen you can see and take surveys from all the campaigns you are participating in.
The campaign this survey response belongs to no longer exists.
The campaign this survey response belongs to is out of date.
The campaign this survey response belongs to is no longer running.
Your user role does not permit you to upload responses for this campaign.
This campaign is out of date
You are not participating in any campaigns.\n\nHit the + icon on the top right to view and download available campaigns.
No campaigns available at this time.
Are you sure that you want to remove this campaign?
There are no surveys to display.\n\nAfter selecting campaigns to participate in, you can view a list of their surveys here.
You have no pending surveys.\n\nYou can manage survey reminders via each campaign\'s information screen.
There is a problem with the campaign setup. \n\nIf the problem continues, please contact an Administrator.
The campaign this survey belongs to is stopped, or otherwise unavailable. Please make sure the campaign it belongs to is up to date.
Authentication error while trying to read campaigns from server.
Unexpected response received from server while trying to read campaigns from server.
Network error occurred while trying to read campaigns from server.
Internal error occurred while trying to read campaigns from server.
The campaign you were participating in has changed. Any responses and charts associated with the old campaign have been removed.
